message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $140. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a tight budget.
Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $125 is just a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference at $132.50? I'm willing to go a little lower than my initial offer to make this work.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. How about $130? I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I really need to stay within my budget.
